document.title: Reference for `RTMS'
document.paragraph:
2SYNOPSYS
#include "eif_plug.h"
EIF_REFERENCE RTMS (char * string);
2DESCRIPTION The RTMS() macro returns the corresponding Eiffel string corresponding to the C string string. It is deprecated and one should use eif_string instead. The return value does not reference string.
2NOTES This function return an Eiffel reference, which must be protected with eif_protect().
2CONFORMANCE ISE Eiffel 4.5 and later.
2COMPATIBILITY
RTMS() is equivalent to eif_string().
2SEE ALSO
eif_protect(1) , eif_create(1).
